name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UCL 'What's On' Quick Add to Calendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly add UCL Student Union 'What's On' events to your calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I found it annoying to cross-reference the time and date and location and stuff and manually add events to my apple calendar... so I made this.
